The Dark Knight.Review: Just the best superhero movie made, the joker is so good.
The Dark Knight.Title: The Dark Knight

12 Angry Men.Review: I love legal movies when they're good, and this is a great one. It's just twelve men in a room, talking, and yet there's a whole story that's very methodically and captivatingly revealed as the film goes on. This is a contender for Sidney Lumet's best work, and Henry Fonda has a great performance too. Excellent movie!
12 Angry Men.Title: 12 Angry Men

Akira.Review: Anime is my least favorite genre, and this is as bad as they get! The plot is awful, the characters are absurd, and nothing is remotely believable.
Akira.Title: Akira

Witness for the Prosecution.Review: Witness for the Prosecution is a fantastic film from Billy Wilder, and one of his best. The chemistry between Charles Laughton and Elsa Lanchester is phenomenal, Tyrone Power gives one of his best performances, and Marlene Dietrich shows why she was such as star. 10/10 all around.
Witness for the Prosecution.Title: Witness for the Prosecution
